function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through person-to-person contact","Impact":"Increased probability of viral transmission if individuals are exposed to COVID-19 through respiratory droplets (e.g. coughing or sneezing)","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures, encourage mask-wearing, and promote proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purifiers, UV disinfection systems","People":"General public, tourists, consumers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, businesses"},{"Description":"Lack of proven treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"Serious consequences for those who become ill with no effective treatment available","Mitigation":"Invest in research for effective treatments, create accessible healthcare infrastructure, and prioritize vaccination programs","Technologies":"Biopharmaceuticals, telemedicine, vaccine distribution systems","People":"Those who become ill with COVID-19, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Medical research organizations, government, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Increased perceived risk due to closer psychological distance","Impact":"Higher perceived risk for consumers, particularly in online purchasing contexts and crisis situations","Mitigation":"Provide detailed product information, virtual product experiences, and transparent return policies","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology, augmented reality applications, secure online payment systems","People":"Consumers, online retailers, e-commerce platforms","Owner":"Online retailers, e-commerce companies"}]}
